title: Cardano Hub Buenos Aires
description: There is no visible Cardano community in Buenos Aires. Argentina suffers from inflation. People lack awareness of Cardano as an option.
solution: Fund A Cardano Hub in Buenos Aires. Host Spanish language events and provide educational workshops, delivered by local community members.
experience:
Hosting Bitcoin meetups and workshops since 2013

Hosting Multiple crypto meetups in Argentina

Hosting Cardano meetups in Toronto.
